title: Set alias for columns not reflected in Expression Builder
description: When setting an alias for columns in a dataset, the Expression Builder still displays the old column names when selecting the dataset.
OB: In the Expression Builder, after setting an alias for a column in a dataset, the old column names are shown when selecting the dataset for binding.
EB: The Expression Builder should reflect the updated aliases of columns when selecting a dataset for binding. It should display the alias names instead of the old column names.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a new datasource and a dataset.
2. Set the alias of the first column in the dataset to 'column1'.
3. Insert a data item and bind it to the dataset.
4. Open the Expression Builder and select the dataset. Observe that the old column names are displayed instead of the assigned aliases.
